about_the_game:
Glob is a fast-paced platformer that really swings into action! Use your gooey sling to pull yourself around, or use it to throw obstacles at enemies!

Exciting sling mechanic

Master your sling as you use it to fly through levels at a blistering pace! The sling allows you to grab onto both terrain and various objects, most likely leading to you flying into a saw blade at first! Once you master the sling, you'll move around levels like a real glob!


Smash your Friends

Race your friends in the time trials or compete in a deathmatch to see who has the fastest sling! Online high scores and matchmaking ensures you'll always have a whole glob of fun!


PvP and Coop

Exciting levels which challenge your platforming and slinging skills as you try to overcome each level by yourself or with friends. It's up to you if you want to be able to sling your friends as you progress through the levels, leading to hilarious moments of betrayal.


Something for everyone

Many varying game modes to cater for everyone - Capture the Flag, Competitive Racing, Arena Battle, Cooperative Puzzles, and more! Group up in teams or try your luck as a lone glob.


Daring leaps and bounds

Featuring gripping sections of daring jumps and swings, you'll need to overcome many challenges to succeed. Did we mention there are lasers?!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: An online fast-paced multiplayer party experience! Master the stretchy power of Glob to sling around the world and throw objects at your enemies! Compete in many competitive game modes or work with friends to solve puzzles and sling through the world together. Did we mention there are lasers?!
